Class RyCON

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.Main
      • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.MainApplication
        • RyCON

  • public class RyCON
extends MainApplication
    RyCON is the entry point of the program.

    This class is used to show the name 'RyCON' for Mac OS X users, because of there is no Info.plist file used at the moment. This will be changed in a future version of RyCON.

    For more information see the Apple documentation about java on the web.

    Because of the fact that there are a lot of users who has java version 7 running, RyCON doesn't use any functions of java version 8. However, RyCON runs under java version 7 or higher.

    Since:
    1
